action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks, using Flail or Javelin in any combination.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage—plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Necrotic damage if the knight is Bloodied—and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its next attack roll before the start of the knight's next turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage—plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Necrotic damage if the knight is {@status Bloodied|XPHB}.
